site.name: FastMove Carpenters
site.description: Registered carpentry company in Pietermaritzburg delivering kitchens, built-ins, doors, decks & shopfitting with fast turnaround.

services.name: Kitchens & Cabinetry
services.description: Design, fabrication, and installation of kitchen units, islands, and storage.

services.name: Built-in Cupboards
services.description: Wardrobes and storage systems tailored to room dimensions.

services.name: Doors & Frames
services.description: Door hanging, frame repairs, and locksets for homes and light commercial.

services.name: Decking & Exterior Wood
services.description: Hardwood decking, pergolas, and outdoor wood maintenance.

services.name: Repairs & Refinishing
services.description: Fix squeaks, rot, water damage, and refinish worn surfaces.

services.name: Shopfitting & Office
services.description: Counters, shelving, and displays for retail & office spaces.
